title: Wapinter
author: Wapinter
created_time: November 15, 2022, 08:06:36 PMLast edit: November 22, 2022, 07:23:06 PM by Wapinter
content: ABOUT CELEBVERSEMETAVERSE LANDCelebverse is world’s first and only virtual world dedicated to ‘Adam & Eve’ original human couple, parents of the human race. In other words, it’s more than metaverse. It is a comprehensive virtual world concocted by the team of seasoned developers and coders. As the name suggests, Celebverse is first of its kind celeb centric virtual world with a community of 24 virtual celebrities where users can have exclusive experience to their cities, concerts, studios, events, gigs, fashion show, merchandise, stores and much more. While giving the freedom to build their own spaces, Celebverse also utilizes its own tech expertise to create complete solution for business which are looking to grow in the virtual environment. Celebverse is a peer-to-peer network supported by powerful, unshakable and trusted Binance Smart Chain.Twitter campaign rules : **Guys on celebverse tweets, also make comments and quote retweet1. Follow https://twitter.com/celebverselive2. Follow https://twitter.com/wapinterportal3. Retweet and like all tweets by https://twitter.com/celebverselive4. Like all tweets by https://twitter.com/celebverselive5. Make a tweet about celebverse every week. Tweet coluld be in any language but make sure to tag @celebverselive6. Join http://t.me/wapinterbounty7. You must have minimum 5k followers8. Payment 3 usdt every week to accepted participants who completes all tasks. All reports must be submitted through below form. You must retweet everyday. Those who did all retweets in ine day will be disqualified Submit reports hereOpen for only 200 participants.First come first serve basis. spreadsheethttps://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1590YlTFWWZjphkvCte3-d02QYYcQ5_X7tOLYega0SQc/edit?usp=drivesdk
